title: LETTERS: Washington politicians need not further complicate tech policy for Americans - Sentinel Colorado
content:
1. LETTERS: Washington politicians need not further complicate tech policy for Americans  Sentinel Colorado
  2. Will Congress Pass New Regulation on Big Tech? Time May Be Running Out.  The New York Times
  3. Big Tech and Foes Spar Over Bill to Curb Market Power of Dominant Internet Platforms  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Senate committee votes to advance major tech antitrust bill  CNBC

description: People appreciate practical politics. And thatâ€™s what they are hoping to see from Washington this year. Especially as the midterm elections draw closer, it would serve them well to buckle down on the kitchen table issues, policy areas where people can feel real impacts, and avoid these nonsensical battles with the companies that are currently making an effort to help everyday families.
